name: Spire Panic
description:
The deal is simple: Pick a hat, pick a map, and mess up some monsters! Defend the "Spire" at all costs, and collect money to construct towers to help defend it. See how long you can survive in one of three worlds. And maybe bring a friend.

Spire Panic! is compatible with Xbox 360 and Xbox One controllers, plug one in and give it a try! (Co-Op requires the use of an Xbox controller)

Disclaimer
This project was made for a game programming class. (Completed December 2020) It was built on an engine which is not mine and which is not available for commercial use. For that reason, there is no monetization for this project nor any donation links. I am making no money from this project and simply wish to share it with the world.

Credits
I worked with another talented student on this project, Andrew. He contributed most of the initial tower spawning and tower shooting code. (15% of total project) Unfortunately, I do not know his surname. I will update this credit when/if I am able.
Most of the game's art comes from Minifantasy artist Krishna Palacio. (https://krishna-palacio.itch.io/)
A large portion of the artwork, including hats for the characters, was made by my wife, Gracie Glebe.
Music was courtesy of my good friend Kaleb Brown. (TheLonelyWriterK: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQXNG26gBrnO3H_w65T82gQ/videos)
There are a few misc sound assets and images which I am no longer sure who created. If I am able to relocate the source of these assets, I will credit them immediately (or replace them if they are not free-use, though I believe all my assets to be free-use or licensed.
